meanings.definition: A soft, plush fabric with a raised pile
meanings.sent1: The velures felt cozy against her skin.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new jacket made of velures.
meanings.sent3: The cat snuggled up on the velures blanket.
meanings.sent4: The velures of the carpet welcomed tired feet.
meanings.sent5: The velures of the teddy bear was so soft, like a cloud.

meanings.definition: To cover or adorn with velures
meanings.sent1: She decided to velures her chair for a luxurious look.
meanings.sent2: He velures the gift box to make it more elegant.
meanings.sent3: The artist velures the painting with intricate details.
meanings.sent4: The chef velures the cake with edible gold for a special occasion.
meanings.sent5: They velures the stage with colorful velures curtains for the performance.

meanings.definition: The act of touching or feeling velures
meanings.sent1: Her velures of the fabric revealed its quality.
meanings.sent2: The velures of the pillow was comforting to her fingertips.
meanings.sent3: He couldn't resist the velures of the soft blanket.
meanings.sent4: The velures of the velvet dress was irresistible to touch.
meanings.sent5: The velures of the upholstery invited exploration with its texture.
